Package fi.tuni.swdesign.group3.gui.view

Class DataQueryValidityChecker

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.group3.gui.view.DataQueryValidityChecker
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombinedDQValidityChecker, RoadDQValidityChecker, WeatherDQValidityChecker
public abstract class DataQueryValidityChecker extends Object
An abstract base class for checking the validity of the DataQuery created using the parameters given by the user.
Author:
Lauri Puoskari

  • Method Details

    • makeDataQueryValidityChecker

      public static DataQueryValidityChecker makeDataQueryValidityChecker(MainView mainView, DataQuery query)
      A Factory method for creating the different subclasses of this abstract base class.
      Parameters:
      mainView - the current instance of the MainView.
      query - the DataQuery to be checked.
      Returns:
      an instance of the chosen subclass of DataQueryValidityChecker. Null if query type is not implemented.

    • checkLocationValidity

      protected String checkLocationValidity()
      A method for checking the validity of the location of the DataQuery.
      Returns:
      A string communicating the result of the check.

    • checkDateTimeValidity

      protected String checkDateTimeValidity()
      A method for checking the validity of the starting and ending times of the DataQuery.
      Returns:
      A string communicating the result of the check.
